ModuleDescription: Students will be given opportunities to work with real companies. The scope of the Field Service Project is part of the initial negotiations between the students and the company. It is an interactive process as the students have to make a preliminary survey of the company before finalising the job scope. The project is divided into stagesâ€“ planning, research and assessment, and recommendations.
Workload: Varies depending on individual students with their supervisor
Prerequisite: Varies according to the nature of the project.
